quote: Your life is a movie. You are the main character. You say your scripts and act to your lines. Of course you do your lines in each scene. There is a hidden camera and a director who you can ask for help anytime up above.
author: Diana Rose Morcilla

quote: Success is not determined by the outcome. The outcome is the result of having already decided that you are successful to begin with.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Sing me a love song in a slow, southern drawl to the tune of sunny days...
author: Kellie Elmore, Magic in the Backyard

quote: I had a dream that I saw shooting stars with you. Two things that will come close to never happening: Seeing shooting stars, and being with you.
author: Karen Quan, Write like no one is reading 2

quote: The energy it took to exit mother’s womb is the same force required to manifest a dream...a different kind of struggle. Push, push, push!
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: If the thought inspires you, and it feels good and right...it is yours, alone, to exercise. So get right on it!
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: While fear depletes power, faith gives wings for the soul’s elevation.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Turn the page, your heroine is still there, breathe, relax, life is beautiful: you're in a book!
author: Gabrielle Dubois

quote: Every quote is like a Picasso. The meaning is different for each person and half the admirers miss the true intent and twisted humor of it all.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: When you experience loss, people say you’ll move through the 5 stages of grief….Denial, Anger, Bargaining, Depression, Acceptance….. What they don’t tell you is that you’ll cycle through them all every day.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: Don't wish...DO! Don't try...BE! Don't think...KNOW! And above all: Bless a stranger with a small, yet powerful, random act of kindness. You feel me?
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Never let haters 'still' your flow. They can only do so with your permission.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: The first law of nature is self-preservation. Cut off that which may harm you. But if it is worth preserving, and is meaningful, nourish it and have no regrets. Ultimately, this is true living and love of self...from within.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Fashion is about going ahead, not about memory.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: I do my job like I breathe — so if I can’t breathe I’m in trouble.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: One who will not accept solitude, stillness and quiet recurring moments...is caught up in the wilderness of addictions; far removed from an original state of being and awareness. This is 'dis-ease.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Fully inhale your dream and completely exhale manifestation of it.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Fashion is about two things: the evolution and the opposite.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Quitting is never an option on the road to success. Find the way forward. If you have a positive mindset and are willing to persevere, there is little that is beyond your reach. The attitude of being ready to work even in the face of challenges and despite odds is what will make all the difference in your life.
author: Roopleen

quote: Cities are never random. No matter how chaotic they might seem, everything about them grows out of a need to solve a problem. In fact, a city is nothing more than a solution to a problem, that in turn creates more problems that need more solutions, until towers rise, roads widen, bridges are built, and millions of people are caught up in a mad race to feed the problem-solving, problem-creating frenzy.
author: Neal Shusterman, Downsiders

quote: That's the problem with best friends. Sometimes they know you better than you know yourself.
author: Cecily von Ziegesar, Nobody Does it Better

quote: The only walls that exist are those you have placed in your mind. And whatever obstacles you conceive, exist only because you have forgotten what you have already achieved.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: The last time I felt alive – I was looking into your eyes.Breathing your air…. touching your skin…… Saying goodbye….The last time I felt alive…. I was dying.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: She will blaze through you like a gypsy wildfire. Igniting you soul and dancing in its flames. And when she is gone, the smell of her smoke will be the only thing left to soothe you.
author: Nicole  Lyons

quote: He was both everything I could ever want…And nothing I could ever have…
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: I think perhaps I will always hold a candle for you – even until it burns my hand.And when the light has long since gone …. I will be there in the darkness holding what remains, quite simply because I cannot let go.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: Sometimes things are just what they seem to be and that's all there is to it.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: By necessity, by proclivity, and by delight, we all quote.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Love is like dried flowers sometimes. Even though you watch the petals shrink and change colour, you cannot help treasuring them
author: Munia Khan

quote: որևէ քաղաք ճանաչելու ամենաճիշտ ձևերից մեկն էլ իմանալն է, թե ինչպե՞ս են այնտեղ աշխատում, ինչպե՞ս են սիրում, և ինչպե՞ս են մեռնում:
author: Albert Camus

quote: She knew there were only small joys in life--the big ones were too complicated to be joys when you got all through--and once you realized that, it took a lot of the pressure off.
author: Lorrie Moore, Like Life

quote: People fear anyone who differs from what is considered normal, and in a small town the idea of normal can be as narrow as the streets.
author: Elizabeth Chandler, The Back Door of Midnight

quote: LOVE is and will ALWAYS be the greatest GIFT ƸӜƷ
author: M.G. Wells

quote: I had an interview once with some German journalist—some horrible, ugly woman. It was in the early days after the communists—maybe a week after—and she wore a yellow sweater that was kind of see-through. She had huge tits and a huge black bra, and she said to me, ‘It’s impolite; remove your glasses.’ I said, ‘Do I ask you to remove your bra?
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: ‎"Based on a true story"? No, thanks. I prefer "based on a true imagination".
author: Enkelejd Lamaj

quote: You do not exist to serve the illusion. The illusion exists to serve you.
author: Lauren Zimmerman

quote: If the fate of the universe was decided in a single moment at the instant of the Big Bang , that was the most creative moment of all.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Then Carrot said, "It's better to light a candle than curse the darkness, captain. That's what they say.""What?" Vimes' sudden rage was like a thunderclap. "Who says that? When has that ever been true? It's never been true! It's the kind of thing people without power say to make it all seem less bloody awful, but it's just words, it never makes any difference -
author: Terry Pratchett, Men at Arms

quote: What are you prepared to give for your dream? If it is not everything...stop pipe dreaming.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: ღ¸.•* Love is Colorblind *•.¸ღ
author: M.G. Wells

quote: Sometimes it takes a meltdown to cool down.
author: Evinda Lepins

quote: Love is holy.
author: William Shakespeare, All's Well That Ends Well

quote: Though these words will never find you, I hope that you knew I was thinking of you today….. and that I was wishing you every happiness.Love Always,The girl you loved once.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: Your life experience is a moving picture, of which you are writer, director, performer, producer and critic.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Writers Are Insane. For months we are lone wolves locked in our caves. Then overnight we become publicity hounds. It's a schizophrenic business.
author: Robert Mykle

quote: I think, to be happy is to be interested and engaged.
author: Aimee Mann

quote: It does not manifest so that you can believe in it. You believe in it so that it can manifest.
author: Lauren Zimmerman

quote: Some people talk about other people’s failures with so much pleasure that you would swear they are talking about their own successes.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Love does not choose belief, place, time, situations, or race. love happens between two souls.
author: Haidji, Harables: Short Stories 1

quote: There's a tide in the affairs of men, which taken at the flood, leads onto fortune, omitted, all their voyages end in shallows and miseries. Upon such tide are we now...
author: William Shakespeare

quote: They say that Good ultimately wins, OK! Sir, Agreed! but the win-loss record of Good vs. Evil is like population of (Moldova vs. China).
author: Mohit Sharma, Vigyapans

quote: The elegance is as physical, as moral quality that has nothing common with the clothing. You can see a countrywoman more elegant than one so called elegant woman.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: What you are, and who you are should provide greater clarity about where you have been and where you are headed. Although one distinguishes spiritual from physical nature, the ultimate unification of the two is the consequence of the struggle for internal, external and eternal – peace.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: What you do teaches faster, and has a lasting impression, far beyond what you say.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Language is the mother, not the handmaiden, of thought; words will tell you things you never thought or felt before.
author: W.H. Auden

quote: When spontaneous demoralizing thoughts seep into your conscience, don't trip...allowing them to fester. These are random tests of your conviction and determination. Large or small, your reaction to such intrusions is a defining moment for which no one else, but you, can mitigate.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Some things are just like riding a bicycle; you jump on, pedal, and hope you don’t fall.
author: Henry Mosquera, Sleeper's Run

quote: God created all things. It's men who decide which ones are mistakes.
author: Beautiful Creatures

quote: Making a dream into reality begins with what you have, not with what you are waiting on.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: If you have a dream, keep it. But write it down and take appropriate actions to see it manifest.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: It is common to represent a title, but inspiring to represent a purpose.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: I have poured my heart out ….And now I am empty.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: There is no end to the adventures that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru, Selected Works of Jawaharlal Nehru, Vol 15, Part 2, 26 October, 1950- 28 February 1951

quote: The only place I ever felt at home was with you. There isn’t a place for me anywhere anymore… I’ve been evicted.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: Quotes ain’t all that useful. Fact is, there’s more concise ways to express what you’re feelin’, like screams and moans.
author: M.C. Humphreys

quote: Poetry is breathing words that gives a reader pause.
author: Ankita Singhal

quote: Today is not just another ordinary day. It is an opportunity to do, or say, something that just might inspire someone to greater becoming...especially a wayward youth.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: From the pastor who has an affair with his secretary, to the jerk at the office who happens to be a deacon, to the overbearing boss who can’t miss his Monday night Bible study, Christians today cause more problems for the gospel than all the devil’s demons put together.
author: Wes Moore, Forcefully Advancing

quote: Unless a convention of anarchists visited the library yesterday, most books ought to be in their rightful places.
author: Evelyn Skye, The Crown's Game

quote: My toes are going to come,"-MariannThe Night Owl
author: Emma Holly, Hot Blooded

quote: Having beef with someone is unnecessary and avoidable. Whatever the issue, if not positive, it is an opportunity to cut the excess fat from an unhealthy dietary network. Simply excuse yourself from the table of negativity and lean forward in peace.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Both friend and enemy reside within us. One lives by the rule of compassion, the other by the rule of hard knocks. Though potential influence of either extreme is inevitable, our actions bear witness to the one we embrace.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: The Motto of Champions: If you are hurt, you can suck it up and press on. If injured, you can rebound and return bigger and better...and continue to inspire!
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Do not hate the player, nor the game...rule it!
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Though I think and speak of greater becoming, I, too, am an infinite work in progress.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Freedom is realizing you have a choice.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Divide the constant tide and random noisiness of energetic flow, with conscious recurring moments of empty mind, solitude, gratitude and deep...slow...breathing. Of this, the natural law of self-preservation demands.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: What surrounds us is what is within us.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: If not in the moment, where do you propose to live?
author: Na'ama Yehuda

quote: Truth is irrelevant
author: what matters is what people believe.

quote: Past and future is determined by what is now…right now! This is why the present is a gift
author: the only one that ultimately matters most.

quote: She had one of those goofy smiles that made you wonder if she was too stupid to know that life sucks most of the time.
author: Darcia Helle, Hit List

quote: God is indeed able to make you what He wants you to be.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

quote: If you want something done, you'll have to dream it yourself.
author: Corey Aaron Burkes

quote: You can't Google life
author: Colin Tegerdine, You Can't Google Life

quote: Perception can be one-sided or variant: "Glass half empty or half full." There usually is more than one way of perceiving. Thoroughly check your inner dialogue.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: I would rather go swimming with great white sharks than wade in romance 'cause I can never find the courage to ask her to dinner or even to dance.
author: Adam Young (Owl City), The Yacht Club

quote: It is more substantial to represent a purpose, rather than just a title.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: If you've delayed achieving your goals, have you ever asked yourself, "What's stopping you?
author: Elizabeth Parker, Bark Out Loud! Motivational Quotes Inspired by Dogs

quote: What is missing in our time is not the willingness of God toact in biblical ways, but the willingness of his people to believehe is still the God of the Bible—and to act on that faith. To throwaway fear, to stride against common wisdom, to risk all that wehave and all that we are so we may follow only our simple beliefthat the God of the Scriptures is still alive and that he will stilldo what he says in his Word.
author: Wes Moore, Forcefully Advancing

quote: I choose many voices to consider and reckon with, rather than just one to tolerate.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: I ate some emotional soup in my childhood and have spent a lifetime trying to digest it.
author: Billy Ray Chitwood, The Cracked Mirror: Reflections of an Appalachian Son

quote: The biggest cause of divorse in my opinion is marriage
author: Paul V. Walters

quote: Writers don't get mad they get even in their novels.
author: Candace C. Bowen

quote: It's amazing how close I have been, all this time, to my old life. And yet the distance that divides me from it is vast.
author: Lauren Oliver, Pandemonium

quote: Forgiveness isn’t something I’m preoccupied with — turning the other cheek isn’t my trip.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: If people were rain, I'd be a drizzle and she'd be a hurricane.
author: John Green

quote: ....but talking to a ghost about a demon when you’re in a room full of people who can’t see either of them is not to be recommended.
author: Kerstin Gier, Saphirblau

quote: Tidak ada kabar adalah kabar, yaitu kabar tidak ada kabar. Tidak ada kepastian juga adalah kepastian, yaitu kepastian tidak ada kepastian. Hidup ini juga memang tentang menunggu. Menunggu kita untuk menyadari: kapan kita akan berhenti menunggu.
author: Tere Liye, Hujan

quote: Love is relentless, and so am I ;)
author: Keisha Keenleyside

quote: The smooth folds of her dress concealed a tumultuous heart, and her modest lips told nothing of her torment. She was in love.
author: Gustave Flaubert, Madame Bovary

quote: Change the world, I know I won’t,Enthralling as always I hope it remains,A kaleidoscope of joy, sorrow and pain.But my only wish as I take this jaunt,Is for my words on you to impress upon,A smile, a tear or even an angry frown.
author: Anurag Anand

quote: Judging by your face, the what-the-fuck nodes in your cerebral cortex must be a real light show.
author: Sam Lipsyte, The Ask

quote: I would like to be a one-man multinational fashion phenomenon.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Maybe love and pain are synonyms.
author: Vanshika Dhyani

quote: People have incredible nerve to do terrible things, but never actually admit to them.
author: Henry Mosquera, Sleeper's Run

quote: I was feeling rational and restless, which is horrible for watching movies
author: Sinclair Lewis, Arrowsmith

quote: I think all artists struggle to represent the geometryof life in their own way, just like writers deal witharchetypes. There are only so many stories that you cantell, but an infinite number of storytellers.
author: Henry Mosquera, Sleeper's Run

quote: Your thoughts make what happen in your life~You can turn anything negative into the positive~What you visualize can come true and you attract it to yourself
author: Pattimari Sheets-Diamond

quote: For an apple you can’t reach up and pick, you have to climb that tree; the tree won’t bend down for you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan, Antiquary Arago's Diary

quote: Balanced emotions are crucial to intuitive decision making.
author: Michael D. Eisner

quote: There wasn't an anhydrous lacrimal gland in the room...
author: Mary Roach, Stiff: The Curious Lives of Human Cadavers

quote: If time is money and you wasted my time, then give me back my money!
author: Ljupka Cvetanova, The New Land

quote: A genius is a lunatic who made it!
author: Steve K. Smy

quote: Dont regret that it just got over, but instead Move on for More!
author: Steven Singh Babbar

quote: Love is God’s medicine.” ~ Amunhotep El Bey
author: Amunhotep El Bey, The Quotations Book of life and Death

quote: It was unhealthy to get too attached. Such things were best reserved for people who had a life expectancy
author: Matthew S. Williams

quote: Bravado may stir the crowd, but courage needs no audience.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Solitude is the house of peace.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: To witness miracles unfold in your experience, count your blessings and be thankful. Perceived small blessings accumulate to be the most powerful.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Be the winner in your life!
author: Tae Yun Kim, Seven Steps to Inner Power

quote: In the game of life, we all receive a set of variables and limitations in the field of play. We can either focus on the lack thereof or empower ourselves to create better realities with the pieces we play the game with.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: If you wish to transform, pretend this day until it is so.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: There is bound to be turbulence in the clouds of confusion before one can view the friendly skies, and an illuminated landing strip.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Do not only think about it, but feel about it, also, before taking appropriate action.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: During moments of strife and 'dis-ease', check your flow and redirect your focus to that which is naturally good.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: When individuals and communities do not govern self, they risk being ruled by external forces that care less about the well-being of the village.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: You will not do incredible things without an incredible dream.
author: John Eliot

quote: If you can't make ends meet, meet them in the middle instead
author: Benny Bellamacina, The King of Rhyme

quote: ...the Statue of Liberty's got this invitation: 'Give me your tired, your poor, your reeking homeless--''Huddled masses,' said Ira. 'Give me your tired, your poor, your huddled masses yearning to breathe free.'...Okay, fine. So like everybody in the old countries says, 'Hey, I'm a huddled mass,' and they all wanna come over.
author: Neal Shusterman, The Schwa Was Here

quote: Life makes fools of us all sooner or later. But keep your sense of humor and you'll at least be able to take your humiliations with some measure of grace. In the end, you know, it's our own expectations that crush us." -- from Skippy Dies
author: Paul Murray, Skippy Dies

quote: Life without Music would be a Mistake. Life without Books would be Catastrophic!
author: Nandini Deka

quote: Bling" is not an indication of riches. It is a product of value-based spending, to enrich the pockets of those outside of ones sphere of influence...the haves' bleeding the have-nots'.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Inspirational quotes are dances of light that shine in dark places during your life.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: You may have the dark and cold street life, ruled by the lessor light of the moon. During this time I restore my temple, and later awake to greet the awesome radiance of the sun-star.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Day or night, good or bad…all things from within.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Stupid quotes are only Twitters in disguise.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Sorry. I get attacks of quotitis every once in a while. It's a very rare disease with no cure. It usually attacks older people, and here i am afflicted with it at my tender age.
author: Madeleine L'Engle, The Joys of Love

quote: It may be a tough world, but its a magical world;Where a mere sunset will make you smile....Amidst all the hardships, When the life you want to live seems a strange place,Be the first to chart this new territory;And leave a clear path for others to follow,They will follow.........You do not have to fell the pressure to lead....You merely followed the horizon where the sun set,which became a beautiful sunrise...Your Sunrise.....
author: Michelle Geaney

quote: Life, for the living, is a gift of opportunity; an exercise of the will to choose.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: The great correspondent of the seventeenth century Madame de Sevigne counseled, "Take chocolate in order that even the most tireome company seem acceptable to you," which is also sound advice today!
author: Barrie Kerper, Paris: The Collected Traveler

quote: Though the earth contains greater energy and mass than any single being, linked together, "people make the world go-round".
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: For the human experience, life in the natural world seems to require the application of meaning, in order to evoke purpose.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Image is only temporal. Substance endures. Who said, "Image is everything"? And who believed it?
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive
author: John Green, Looking for Alaska

quote: People who believe they have bad luck create bad luck. Those who believe they are very fortunate, that the world is a generous place filled with trustworthy people, live in exactly that kind of world.
author: Chris Prentiss, The Alcoholism and Addiction Cure

quote: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
author: Nicole  Lyons

quote: I would have followed you to hell and back... if only you'd lead me back.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: Maybe you'll change Abandon all your wicked waysMake amends and start anew againMaybe you'll seeAll the wrongs you did to meAnd start all over, start all over again.Who am i kidding?Now, lets not get overzealous hereYoure always been a huge piece of shitIf i could kill you i wouldBut it's frowned upon in all fifty statesHaving said that, burn in Hell.
author: Set it off

quote: It wasn't exactly love at first sight, but it was deeper than that. A sense of belonging to a place I never knew I wanted but somehow always needed. It was a home that carried a heartbeat.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: How can you fight stupidity effectively? The answer is simple: it’s not easy.
author: Carl William Brown, Aforismi contro il potere e la stupidità

quote: What would Golan Do? That way I can ask myself before I do anything. Before I take a dump. How would Dr. Golan want me to take this dump? Should I bank it off the side or go straight down the middle? What would be the most psychologically beneficial dump I could take?
author: Ransom Riggs, Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children

quote: Famous people steal my quotes all of the time without knowing
author: none of it is ever very interesting though.

quote: Cottage cheese, broken down into its simplest form, is milk that has been curdled to mimic the cellulite its consumption is meant to banish.
author: Elsie Love

quote: Threatened men live long.
author: Rudyard Kipling, Puck of Pook's Hill

quote: I’ve got some questions,Are you sick of feelin’ sorry?And people sayin’ not to worry?Sick of hearing this hakuna matata motto,From people who won the lotto,We’re not that lucky.Have you noticed that you’re breathing?Look around and count your blessings,So when you’re sick of all this stressin’ and guessin’I’m suggestin’ you turn this up and let them hear you sing it
author: Set it off

quote: If you have to choose between any two, first choose time to think.
author: Mohith Agadi

quote: What's up with you? How come you're being like this?' Because it's the truth. This is the world we live in.
author: Chuck Palahniuk, Choke

quote: Many obese people spend a significant amount of their energy on suppressing the urge to tell some of the people who are staring at them that they do not eat as much and as frequently as they seem to.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: I do not think he (Chester Arthur) knows anything. He can quote a verse from poetry or a page from Dickens or Thackeray, but these are only leaves springing from a root out of dry ground. His vital forces are not fed,and very soon he has given out his all.
author: Harriet Blaine

quote: This path was not that of my conscious choosing. But after persistent subconscious confrontation, I have finally embraced what is, 'souly' for me...and I am thankful, when called upon, to be able to share and give to those who seek their own way of the path.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: I live to inspire, not start the fire.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quote: He had had a severe shock some weeks earlier, when, having narrowly failed to capture a large grey-brown hare for his dinner, it had stopped at the edge of the forest, looked at him with disdain, and said, 'Well, I hope you're proud of yourself, that's all,' and had scampered off into the long grass
author: Neil Gaiman, Stardust

quote: I drift like a cloud,Across these venerable eastern lands,A journey of unfathomable distances,An endless scroll of experiences...Lady Zhejiang here we must part,For the next province awaits my embrace.Sad wanderer, once you conquer the East,Where do you go?
author: Tom  Carter, China: Portrait of a People

quote: Nor is there wanting in the pressSome spirit to stand simply forth,Heroic in it nakedness,Against the uttermost of earth.The tale of earth's unhonored thingsSounds nobler there than 'neath the sun;And the mind whirls and the heart sings,And a shout greets the daring one.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Fear is the lack of faith in one's ability to create powerful solutions.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Rulers are not anointed. They are created by the void of self-mastery.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: So I don’t think I’ll make Poet Laureate,but I swear I’m not twisted and bitter,If finely-wrought talentsdon’t weigh in the balance,I can always write haiku on Twitter.
author: Rosy Cole, The Twain: Poems of Earth and Ether

quote: There’s no better way to get to know a city than to walk its streets. A place will reveal its soul through its sights, sounds and smells, and eventually, it’ll teach you its rhythm.
author: Henry Mosquera, Sleeper's Run

quote: There is too much pain in the world,in all shapes and forms.That is what these people represent.Pain from losing their homes,the death of a loved one,failing an exam,having a leg amputated,not getting a resident permit after years of hoping for a better life...That's what binds them,That's what they potray.Pain.
author: Esther Verhoef, Close-up

quote: Stories You Can Feel!
author: Corey Aaron Burkes, Scratch - with Audio Theater and Links

quote: This isn't the road home. This is a road littered with questions that will inevitably lead to an answer.
author: Meryl S. Kavanagh

quote: I love with love, so that we all may love." ~ Amunhotep El Bey
author: Amunhotep El Bey, The Quotations Book of life and Death

quote: Any self-defense class worth its salt will tell you thatyou don’t pull out a weapon unless you intend to use it.The same should apply to ballsy remarks.
author: Henry Mosquera, Sleeper's Run

quote: Get busy with the issue! In this regard, time is not friendly…nor should it be.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Be creative enough to dream, brave enough to try, persistent enough to succeed, and humble enough to thank those who helped you along the way.
author: Elizabeth Parker, Bark Out Loud! Motivational Quotes Inspired by Dogs

quote: People that love quotes are those short on time, but long on big ideas.
author: Bruce Edwin

quote: My father once told me that it’s not enough for a man to be lucky
author: that a guy has to know when that streak is on for him.

quote: God is the Master Author of your life. He has written every page of your life story in His eternal book. It's up to you to turn up the pages and move on with the next chapter or just get yourself stuck in the same content over and over again."- Elizabeth's Quotes
author: Elizabeth E. Castillo

quote: ... [They] took it upon themselves to start the laborious process of cranking up life again, after death has stopped us all in its tracks.
author: Diane Setterfield

quote: I love when people quote me. It makes me feel that my words have meaning. People give words power. When they speak out for things they feel, we all become alive.
author: Jennifer Megan Varnadore

quote: I don’t care what Einstein said about God not playing dice; If he exists, he’s addicted to craps.
author: Henry Mosquera, Sleeper's Run

quote: Sleep is death enjoyed.
author: Friedrich Hebbel

quote: berhati-hatilah kalo menghujat para maling dan pelacur. "Because we might do the same.
author: Rama Wibi, The Story of L'Arc~en~Ciel - 4 Colours in a Rainbow

quote: At the end to death I must go,Finishing a real tragic and funny show.
author: Mohit K. Misra

quote: Só a quero porque não a posso ter.Como um rapaz imberbe
author: Madeline Hunter, Lord of a Thousand Nights

quote: Where have all the Fembots gone?
author: Ren Garcia

quote: Always be wary of people who use quotes. I don't know who said that.' - Murdoc Niccals
author: Gorillaz, Gorillaz: Rise of the Ogre

quote: I was always exceedingly delighted with that saying of Chrysostom, "The foundation of our philosophy is humility"; and yet more pleased with that of Augustine: "As the orator, when asked, What is the first precept in eloquence? answered, Delivery: What is the second? Delivery: What is the third? Delivery: so if you ask me concerning the precepts of the Christian religion, I will answer, first, second, and third, Humility.
author: John Calvin, Institutes of the Christian Religion, 2 Vols

quote: life weighs heavy upon my shoulders and patience starts wearing thin, it is divine hope and dreams which sustain me, pushing me forth against the wind.
author: Terry A. O'Neal

quote: Quotation confesses inferiority.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson, Uncollected Writings

quote: It’s easy to get caught up in where the world is going and lose sight of the direction we were headed.
author: Terry A. O'Neal

quote: Wednesday had come and gone in a single breath. As I dreamt of divine love, Picasso, and a vast field of gold, a new dawn had already begun.
author: Terry A. O'Neal

quote: Anybody can fail.
author: M.G. Hardie, It Ain't Just The Size

quote: Sometimes you will let go meet others, travel, experience beautiful things, but there's always someone you feel is home.
author: Jennifer Pierre

quote: They are ever-changing. They are unlike immortals who stay young and beautiful forever—who have time under their control. Humans, they only have a few years to live, and yet there is beauty in the way time controls them.
author: Kaye Allen, Chasing Sunsets: Love & Wonders Anthology

quote: Gentle whispers from above Awakened me more Than ever did This loud world
author: Holly Ducarte, Confetti Confessions: Thoughtful micro poetry on matters of the heart, life, and nature

quote: Feels so good to be quoted
author: Malebo Sephodi

quote: Some fail because after they choose the direction for their careers, they spend too much time second-guessing their decision.
author: Kim Ha Campbell, Inner Peace Outer Abundance

quote: Sunshine brings a new day,moonlight ends the harsh light.
author: Cara Beatrice

quote: Ko kiti priplavajo v vaše srce, ga nikoli več ne zapustijo.
author: Živa Vivianaia Dor

quote: You can't break the broken.
author: Margarete Cassalina, See You at Sunset

quote: My mother was a voice of reason, a reminder that they had to stay focused and fully assess the situation. Her composure calmed everybody; her strong manner inspired them. This, I realized, was how a leader behaved.
author: Richelle Mead, Frostbite

quote: In the real world, you can make your own miracles
author: Richelle Mead, Frostbite

quote: Producers problems is in need of vocalist and Vocalist problems is in need of a Studio.
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: No matter how far I go, I'm still your person. We stand together now.
author: Kendare Blake, One Dark Throne

quote: I have joyfully done much evil in my life to those who have wished me evil (General Maximus)
author: Rudyard Kipling, Puck of Pook's Hill

quote: What does life give me in the end but sorrow?What do love's good and evil send but sorrow?I've only seen one true companion - pain,And I have known no faithful friend but sorrow.
author: Hafez, The Nightingales are Drunk

quote: Peace within us starts when we learn to forgive and let go
author: Mimi Novic

quote: Inside the scrawny adolescent was a soul that defied extinction.
author: Yen, Yen's World: Are you afraid to dream? Do you have the courage to believe your dream?

quote: Don't aim for perfection. Aim for 'better than yesterday'.
author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quote: The more open we are, the more we can learn. The more we learn, the more we recognize that every one of us is a hero
author: Kim Ha Campbell, Inner Peace Outer Abundance

quote: When Kylie was ready, Blair went into her friend’s room and lay next to her on the bed. Blair started to thread her fingers through the doctor’s soft curls, speaking to her in a soothing voice. “It’s gonna be all right. Everything will work out. We’re gonna be one small, happy family.” She kept up her ministrations, until she felt Kylie’s body relax, and then slowed down and finally stopped. Kylie was sound asleep, and Blair couldn’t resist staying right where she was. She nestled her cheek against Kylie’s back, listening to her strong, sure heartbeat and the steady intake of breath. It’s gonna be so nice when I can sleep with her, she thought. Just lying here with her calms me down. She noticed that Mackenzie was unusually calm, too, and whispered, “Mama Kylie calms you down, too, doesn’t she, Mackenzie? All we have to do now is convince her that we’re gonna love her as much as she loves us.
author: Susan X. Meagher, All That Matters

quote: To me, quotes function as the sunscreen against a writers brilliance. As soon as I cannot stand to look at the magnificence of the acropolis of pure thought the writer managed to doll out in the cognizant chaos - I quote him, and by doing so I am discharged and freed. On the other hand, even while I do acknowledge that some things cannot be quoted, I vehemently distrust any writer whose army of quotes does not consist of impeccable warriors but the sort of bootless canon fodder that caused one to write in the first place, wishing to circumlocute that strappant lot. No writer can ever recover from bad quotes. I check the army of quotes, and if it has no sporting chance against a simple pack of butter then I will simply never ever read this person. One often hears short stories are the benchmark of great writers, but if you ask me, I'd rather first look at their quotes.
author: Martijn Benders

quote: I had never seen the end of day and the beginning of the night greet each other. We were caught in the loveliness between the two. A House Like a Lotus
author: Madeleine L’Engle

quote: The funny part of being funny is when you start seeing your fans writing funny words and attributing them to you.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: When I have someone to express my sexuality with, I express it with gusto. I think new levels of gusto are in the offing, because I’m finally lying with the woman I was meant to be with.” She kissed her tenderly. “The one who holds my heart.” Shelby threw her arms around Jemma’s shoulders and held on tightly. “I loved you long before I knew what love meant. Now I’m sure. Of our love. Of you. Of us.” Jemma kissed her, tears showing once more. “Now I know heaven exists.” Another sweet kiss followed quickly. “I see it in your eyes.
author: Susan X. Meagher, The Reunion

quote: ...Pouring every bit of the emotion she felt into her kiss, Blair melted into her partner until she could feel own her knees weaken. “I love you so much. It… it frightens me, but I can’t hold back.” “It frightens you?” “Yes. More than I can tell.” “Don’t be frightened,” Kylie murmured. “I’ll never hurt you, sweetheart. I swear!” “I know,” Blair said. “It’s not that… it’s… oh, I don’t know what it is. I’m just scared.” “Don’t let love frighten you. It’s freeing. Trust me.” “I do. I do trust you.” “That’s what love is,” Kylie said fervently. “It’s jumping out of a plane without a parachute, but knowing with every fiber of your being that you’re safe. Your lover will protect you. No matter what. It’s blind faith, Blair. Totally blind faith.” "I’ve never… ever felt this way before,” Blair said, tears filling her eyes. “I’m so frightened, Kylie. Please, please don’t hurt me.” She held on to her lover with all of her might, sobbing so hard she felt sick. “I’ll always be there for you. I’ll catch you. I promise I’ll catch you.
author: Susan X. Meagher, All That Matters

quote: Nothing crushes in the person his sense of self such as him following the common opinions, and be unable to make criticizing positions against what he hears or sees.The ability to express the convictions is the line between the ability and inability, and the awakening and sleep, and the growing and dwarfism.
author: Maryam Abdullah Alnaymi

quote: ...This wasn’t just Kylie. This was the woman she had chosen above every other person in the world. This woman was the most important person in her universe, and she was determined to show her how true that was.
author: Susan X. Meagher

quote: It's time to respect yourself and your dream, both truly deserve that respect. be the person you would do anything for. Be the person you will not let down.
author: Loren Weisman, The Artist's Guide to Success in the Music Business: The “Who, What, When, Where, Why & How” of the Steps that Musicians & Bands Have to Take to Succeed in Music

quote: The thought of Annie being gone was too much to bear. I swear I heard gasps from the girls as Abby released the words of her passing to the screen.
author: Vicki Perry, The Chat Room

quote: Like Cupid,your promiseswere just misses.
author: Timothy Joshua

quote: Never trust a strange place because there might be someone or something that may introduce you to your death.
author: Jaydeep Shah, Horror Stories 3: Knock of Death

quote: Everyone has a story to tell, so why not let me put it on paper!
author: Maija Monreaux

quote: Love is always patient and kind. It is never jealous. Love is never boastful or conceited. It is never rude or selfish. It does not take offense and is not resentful.
author: Nicholas Sparks, A Walk to Remember

quote: Blair was home when Kylie arrived the next night, and as soon as the doctor walked into the house, Blair called out, “Get changed! I brought carryouts for dinner. We’re gonna spend the whole night talking about the dangerous world of lesbianism.” “I have a feeling that someone’s not taking my concerns very seriously,” Kylie said when she walked into the kitchen. Blair gave her a hug and said, “I take you and your concerns very seriously. But I’m confident that I’ve thought of the repercussions, and I know that once I convince you of that, we’re gonna be fine.” She gave her a dazzling smile and said, “Is it okay if I’m happy about that?” “I suppose so,” Kylie said, trying but failing to look aggrieved. She wrapped her arms around Blair and playfully tossed her back and forth. “You’re so darned cute that I can barely stand it!” “Oh, you haven’t seen half of it. Just you wait. I’ll confound you with cuteness.
author: Susan X. Meagher, All That Matters

quote: You will meet great beings when you come out of the well and see the world.
author: Mohith Agadi

quote: I give him the kind of smile only shared between two people who desperately hate something and thoroughly enjoy hating it together.
author: Tracey Neithercott, Gray Wolf Island

quote: Kylie and Nick went to the symphony the next night, and by the time she came home, Blair was sound asleep on the sofa. The doctor gently woke her and helped her to her feet. “But I wanna stay up and talk about being a lesbian,” Blair mumbled, her words sounding comical given her tousled hair and sleep-suffused voice. “We can talk about being lesbians tomorrow.” Kylie scratched the back of Blair’s neck, knowing that a good scratch was as effective as ether. By the time they reached the bedroom, Kylie merely had to urge her onto the bed and cover her with a quilt. “That’s my girl,” Kylie said.
author: Susan X. Meagher, All That Matters

quote: A really cultured woman, like a really cultured man, is all the simpler and the less obtrusive for her knowledge; it has made her see herself and her opinions in something like just proportions; she does not make it a pedestal from which she flatters herself that she commands a complete view of men and things, but makes it a point of observation from which to form a right estimate of herself. She neither spouts poetry nor quotes Cicero on slight provocation; not because she thinks that a sacrifice must be made to the prejudices of men, but because that mode of exhibiting her memory and Latinity does not present itself to her as edifying or graceful
author: George Eliot, Silly Novels by Lady Novelists

quote: Remember that reading these quotes will not change your life. These quotes only work to push you in the right direction. You are the only one who can change you.
author: Avina Celeste

quote: I am a writer and things which don't happen in real world, happen in my world.
author: Amay Saxena

quote: In a world full of automated responses be the one who responds personally!
author: Jennifer White - Strong Heart Awakening

quote: She loved him. She loved Ryder Davis. She loved his stupid face and his dumb smile and his idiotic biceps.
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: It was perfect. Just right. Just what the raging, frothing she-demon inside her needed. The demon that had driven the stupid argument between them and nothing short of his possession was going to drive her out. Revenge sex had taught Juliet that it wasn’t possible to screw the angry out, but if anyone could, it was Ryder. She moved restlessly against him as he held himself high inside her. “Again,” she demanded. “More.”“Christ.” His breath was hot on her neck, his voice strained and clearly pissed off. “You’re so fucking bossy.
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: I’m not going to be the bad guy here, Ryder, because you can’t be like every other man out there and think with your dick.
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: I don’t suppose you’re going to be able to—” She looked around for lurking roommates and leaned in a little closer. “Fuck with that? Especially if it’s broken.”Ryder smiled. “I can fuck with all but a broken dick and even then, I’d give it a red hot try.” He lunged, grabbing her arm and she squealed playfully as he dragged her towards him. “Come and sit in my lap and I’ll show you.
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: The man ticked all of her boxes. Compassionate, kind, thoughtful. But he was alpha as fuck on a rugby field. And in the bedroom. Or on a balcony. Or in front of a mirror. Or up against a wall. She really should walk away. Now. Right now. Hell, she should run.
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: He didn’t try to kiss her. She probably would have bitten him if he had. This wasn’t nice sex. It wasn’t considerate. This wasn’t the kind of sex lovers had. It was two angry people trying to fuck each other into submission.And she’d never been more turned on in her life.
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: I ask for so little. Just fear me, love me, do as I say and I will be your slave.” Jareth the Goblin King
author: Kat Evans, The Domme Tamer

quote: Jillian had charged into the bathroom on seven, but she just shot straight to ten. Her nature may be reserved, but she didn’t take shit off anybody. “Don’t patronize me. And don’t you dare come down here and judge us!” She pointed her finger directly at AJ. “We’re the ones doing the heavy lifting, so people like you can come along at the very end and ride along on our coattails. You can act tough all you want, but it’s just an act, AJ. You, with your expensive suits and shiny shoes,” she sneered. “You wouldn’t survive one minute out there on those streets. You’re weak.” Before she realized what was about to happen, AJ seized her by the shoulders and threw her against the wall. Pinning her with her own body, she pressed her index finger over Jillian’s lips. “That’s enough.” Those glittering green eyes warned Jillian not to say another word. The impact had completely knocked the breath out of her. AJ pressed her body tighter into hers, preventing Jillian from taking a replenishing breath, so she breathed short shallow breaths through her nose. Her heart pounded. What was happening? She wasn’t in control of the situation, and oddly enough, for once she didn’t want to be. She had just been manhandled, yet she had no desire to fight back. Instead, she wanted to hook her leg around AJ’s waist and draw her closer to where AJ’s heat seared her core.
author: Kat Evans, The Domme Tamer

quote: Jesus was more forgiving to those who made mistakes in love than to those who judged each other harshly and were cold of heart.
author: Madeline L'engle

quote: An intelligent investor sees an opportunity in dip than risk.
author: Mohith Agadi

quote: Whatever am I going to do with that monster, Ryder Davis?”He gave a husky laugh. “I think you could probably just tell it to come now and it would.
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: And did I mention how much chicks dig guys with dogs? Go out with Tiny and they’ll flock.”“Val...” Ryder shoved a hand through his hair. “I play in one of the country’s most elite rugby teams. I’m on the tele. And billboards. In my underwear. I do okay with the chicks.
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: You told me your mother wants grandchildren.”“My mother wants George Clooney to move to the farm too but that ain’t ever going to happen.
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: I’ve been lumbered with this great lug of dog through a friend of a friend for a couple of months and he has some ...behavioural problems I need to manage ASAP.” “Really?” Her gaze switched to Tiny who wagged his tail looking completely angelic. Ryder could have sworn the damn mutt was smiling. “Look at you, you gorgeous boy,” she crooned, unlatching a section of the counter, lifting it up and ducking through it to join him on the other side. Tiny wagged his tail harder as Juliet approached, one hand held out in friendly greeting. Tiny, whose head came to her breasts, took full advantage, nosing her right in the cleavage as the woman slid her hands on either side of his face and cooed at him. “You are adorable, aren’t you?”Tiny licked, actually licked, her cleavage then shot a shit eating grin in Ryder’s direction. If the dog had eyebrows, one of them would be arrogantly cocked. Ryder blinked. The damn animal had more game than him. “Are you sure?” She leaned forward to drop some kisses between Tiny’s eyes, pushing his snout even further into the cushioned heaven between her breasts. “He seems very placid.”Tiny’s gave an ecstatic little shiver, his tail a blur as it dusted the floor. “Trust me. He’s the antichrist.”“Oh I don’t believe that,” she said to Tiny, her voice light and teasing, her mouth a cute little moue. “Look how sweet and well behaved he is. Good boy.” She kissed him again. “Good boy.”Ryder would be sweet and well behaved if Juliet called him a good boy while cradling his head between her breasts. Hell, he’d roll over and play dead if she wanted.
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: Ryder stepped into the hallway to discover Tiny sitting in the middle, his tail wagging in greeting and what looked like a goofy smile on his face. Despite Tiny’s size, his behaviour and the sheer impracticality of having him here, Ryder felt stupidly happy to see his big, dumb face. For about two seconds. Until he saw the offering at Tiny’s feet. A steaming mountain of crap right in the middle of the hall runner.Ryder blinked. He’d never seen so much dog doo in his life. What the hell had they been feeding him? Bricks?
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever
