author: Ava, You Are Safe Here.

quote: i sometimes think i'm too in love with alone. who could i love more than this peace?
author: Ava, You Are Safe Here.

quote: Never dwell in resentment, but never forget to learn from the reflection.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Go relentlessly in the direction of your ultimate purpose of life and that which makes you happy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Always be true to yourself
author: you matter the most.

quote: A good story is always written with the tears of tragedies and triumphs, and the love and kindness of our lives.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Every human being has to build a secret temple in his soul where he can shelter himself and find himself again and again.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: keep following your heart.it won't always be easy, but it'll be the most important thing you'll do.
author: Ava

quote: Let me be one of the people who writes their life history, not with ink, with the colors of a caring heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: This world is the playing ground of our thoughts and imaginations which create our perceptions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To make it a habit, do it again and again until it becomes a ritual.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: That which is essential for life, can never be bought.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Religion is a belief with a set of rules, regulations, and rituals created by someone with his thoughts, imaginations, experiences, and wisdom. Most religions bring about positive changes for society. Spirituality is a perception of inner truth, inner beauty, and inner reality. Spirituality involves trusting your own experiences.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Achieving a goal is important, but what is more important is the distance that you have to travel with its ups and downs, fears and failures.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: i am learning that when love wants to stay it will stay.i am learning that when love wants to go it will go.
author: Ava

quote: everyone is in a hurry and things are always disappearing, and i am always left standing here--alone, waiting for the things that stay.
author: Ava

quote: If a goal is only success oriented and not happiness oriented, then it will fill your life with stress, anxiety, and frustration.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: there is something magical and addicting about going somewhere, being alone, and finding yourself in parts of the world you never knew existed, finding parts of yourself you never knew you would find.
author: Ava

quote: i let you love me.i let you take care of me.i let you do things to meno one was allowed to do before.
author: Ava

quote: In this modern world it is easy to be complex but difficult to be simple. At least try to keep your mind simple.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Knowing your ignorance is better than your knowledge.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Let us imitate nature—not each other.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: they say people only hear what they want to hear,but i don't know if that is always true, i've been wanting to hear your heart and it's as silent as the moon.
author: Ava

quote: We are all looking for beauty all around us
author: only those whose heart is loving and appreciative will find it.

quote: To begin a new journey is never easy, but we have to start somewhere to reach a new destination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To enlighten the world, let your light of love and kindness shine as bright as the morning sun.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Live with boldness! Get drunk with all of the beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: i am not a jealous person,but when i am with you,the thought of someone elsepulling your attention away from mekills me a little insideeach time.
author: Ava

quote: Our work is the presentation of our capabilities.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: through the rose glass window in their beautiful new home, you stare at the love you gave away.
author: Ava

quote: it is hard not to count the hoursi have left with you.it is hard to be here now--knowing everything between uswill come to an end.
author: Ava

quote: Life is a piece of art drawn by love on the canvas of hope with the colors of desires, wants, and needs.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: How often must I get lost in a strange land of fairytales so that I can find my true self?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Pain is inevitable in life; you can’t avoid it. You can only feel it. Realize its true nature without emotional attachment and then transcend yourself and your emotions beyond that level. Pain will not go away, but you find that it is not hurting you that much.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: How could this be so, I wondered, as I read Mr. Underwood's editorial. Senseless killing--Tom had been given due process of law to the day of his death; he had been tried openly and convicted by twelve good men and true; my father had fought for him all the way. Then Mr. Underwood's meaning became clear: Atticus had used every tool available to free men to save Tom Robinson, but in the secret courts of men's hearts Atticus had no case. Tom was a dead man the minute Mayella Ewell opened her mouth and screamed.
author: Harper Lee, To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: By changing your perception, awareness, and actions you create yourself again and again.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The best knowledge is knowing yourself and your inner being.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Always be a seeker. Always be a giver without expecting anything in return. Remember that true joy is in the journey not the destination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To find true freedom, relinquish all of your attachments.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your universe is not out there. You create it every moment and every day with your thoughts, ideas, perceptions, and imaginations.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you have to ask, ask for the ability to help others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be fearless like a newborn that is born with love and hope.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Conquering your fear gives you the best victory.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Meditation is a way of finding inner quietness and inner tranquility.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You may not be able to understand the world, but you can create your own world with your perception and imagination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Meditation creates harmony in the midst of chaos in my inner world and outer reality.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Religion is a set of rituals.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: True prayer does not seek God’s help, but it focuses on what is good for everyday life and all of humanity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: No matter where you are, just be grateful for your life and all of the beauty that surrounds you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: oh, the heartbreakingly beautiful tender weight of being human.
author: Ava, You Are Safe Here.

quote: i would've done anything to make you happy.i think you knew that.i think this is why you knew you had to let me go.
author: Ava

quote: If I can’t sing, then let me listen to the songs of the wilderness and let me watch the dance of a lonely leaf.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you learn to feel the pain of an ant, you will truly learn to love this world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: you'd take one look at me and whole pieces of the earth would break off and fall away finally leaving me alone with you.
author: Ava

quote: i do not know how to live tepidly.i was never built to fit in.i live by my souland my soul is insane.
author: Ava

quote: Be silent, but let your silence become the loudest message of love and compassion.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The price of happiness is unconditional love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Live in the moment. Don’t carry baggage from the past. Put that baggage in a history book and learn from it, but don’t carry it on your shoulder. You will feel lighter and be able to enjoy the present and the future.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The soul is soft, beautiful, delicate, fun-loving, and always blooming. To nurture the soul, it needs sunshine and unconditional self-love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don’t try to fit in
author: try to change.

quote: It is the ultimate opportunity of a lifetime to try to understand the dreams and desires of a blooming flower.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The language of a smile is charming, mesmerizing, meaningful, and often mysterious, but everyone understands a smile better than words.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When I look at the moon, I can only see your joyful smile.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be a wave of kindness that touches the hearts of everyone.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Keep your goal challenging enough that you have to change to achieve it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you go beyond your limitations, that is called success.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don’t be afraid to change. Without change, there is no life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Through art we can see the reflection of the inner world of an artist.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Art is a language which everyone understands in their own way.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You must have a definite purpose of life. To reach that purpose, you must be flexible.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be an example of small acts of kindness
author: help someone in need.

quote: I love only the god whose religion is kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Conformity is the biggest enemy of progress. Break those limiting social rules.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A thinker will die, but his profound ideas have wings that fly forever.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In February when my garden is barren of flowers, you are the only flower blooming in my heart. I cherish you and adore you with all of my heart because you are my Valentine.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Distance is an outer phenomenon. In the inner world, everything is connected with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You only have one heart, but it can love the whole world and still have room to grow kindness in its deepest chamber.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A smile is a sparkle of your soul and a glint of light from your heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A baby is born like a bird ready to soar from the mother’s lap. The nets of societal rules and regulations puts him in a cage from which he can never escape to create his own new world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Trying to fit in will not change a society. To change it, you have to be brave, fearless, and strong enough to withstand societal criticism so that you may break the boundary and let light come in.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don’t fear obstacles
author: offer a better path to walk on.

quote: I fall asleep with the sound of rain
author: I wake up with the songs of the wind.

quote: Give away everything—even your heart, soul, and mind. Nothing is yours. Keep your experiences and your memories. Those are yours and they make you who you are.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life becomes perfect if I look at it through my imperfect perceptions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: My songs of life are so secret that I can’t find my tune.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Live in order to be-not just for becoming.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The beauty of life does not reside in certainty or conformity. It resides in the infinite possibilities of uncertainty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life’s journey can never end
author: it only just began.

quote: Just like a flower, enjoy the joy of giving.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Use your greatness, love, and kindness to change the world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We become angels when we fly with the wings of love. We can reach any destination and touch any heart without any hesitation.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To enjoy the magnificence of life, keep love blooming in your heart just like flowers bloom in your garden.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Abundance is not defined by possessions, but it is defined by inner perceptions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life will be perfect if your expectations and responses to events are humble and perfect.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Change your perspective. Enjoy every failure as a success and every win as a loss.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Today is the most important day of your life. Enjoy it with all of your heart. Don’t worry about tomorrow, leave it for tomorrow.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is everything. Nothing else but love can define the destiny of humanity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We enjoy beauty through our perceptions, and we create beauty through our expressions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The ultimate source of abundance is to give love for the betterment of others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To have abundance, appreciate what you have with great love and share your possessions with joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To live in happiness, always do something that will bring joy to others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To create abundance in life, travel and touch everyone you meet with your infinite love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Like a floating feather in the air, take life very lightly and joyfully adjust to the flow of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life itself is the journey of the mind toward the unknown infinite wilderness. Get lost.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Like the morning sun, raise the brightness of your love to include everyone.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The sun is rising. Let us feel the glint of light in the heart so that we can see and enjoy the magnificence of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Never fear to be wonderful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Even though storms will come, never fear to bloom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The sun is rising with a bright golden glittering glint. Let us wake up to enjoy the joyful battles of light and darkness.
author: Debasish Mridha
